did.unittitle: Isaac Siegmeister Decisions as Impartial Chairman of Board of Arbitration of Millinery Industry on Microfilm
did.abstract: This collection consists of the records of Mr. Siegmeister's activities as Impartial Chairman of the Millinery Industry.
